item.title: Chart Your Course with Smugglers Leaf
item.description:
Chart Your Course with Smugglers Leaf

Awaken with Rise and Shine or drift to dreams with Beauty Sleep. Inspired by our 4th great-grandfather Captain Gideon Pendletons rebellious voyages, these organic blends, now in loose leaf or plastic-free tea bags, bring adventure and calm to your cup. Take the helm—sip Smugglers Leaf today!

lbarrick@questex.com Tue, 12/10/2024 - 15:10

item.title: Spill The Tea: Your guide to blended, flavored, and herbal tea
item.description:
Spill The Tea: Your guide to blended, flavored, and herbal tea

Spill The Tea condenses 15 years of industry knowledge, answering key questions about flavored and blended tea. It covers topics like flavoring, blend composition, supply chain complexities, and hidden costs through expert interviews, providing readers with essential insights into the tea industry.

lbarrick@questex.com Thu, 11/14/2024 - 12:54
Spill The Tea condenses 15 years of industry knowledge, answering key questions about flavored and blended tea. It covers topics like flavoring, blend composition, supply chain complexities, and hidden costs through expert interviews, providing readers with essential insights into the tea industry.

Veronica's International Palace of Tea luxury advent calendars, a perfect corporate gift & new product offer. More dessert & holiday teas than any other. item.title: Exquisite Tea Jewelry designed and produced by Geminna LLC
item.description:
Exquisite Tea Jewelry designed and produced by Geminna LLC

Gina Barua, founder of Geminna LLC, created the exquisite Tea jewelry set in silver, designed to evoke joy in its wearer. Growing up in Assam, India, among tea growers, Gina was inspired by the women tea pickers and their artistry. This unique jewelry, crafted by local artisans, honors tea's rich heritage while prioritizing eco-friendly practices. Celebrating 200 years of Assam's tea industry, the set connects wearers to its magical, artisanal roots.

cbroadwell@que… Thu, 10/24/2024 - 08:16
